Implementation of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning

As informatics student, artificial intelligence and machine learning is a compulsory subject. Usually in these subjects students will learn the concept in the class and do the implementation as a task. The task will be to do some classification or clustering to a set of data using algorithm we've studied in the class. Click on link below for mine.

Experiences

Basic Algorithm Practicum Assistant

Oversee the course of the lab and give some clue to students on their lab task. Also give score to their work. At the end of the semester I was tasked with guiding them in their final assignment in the basic programming algorithm's subject. Sometimes give score to their final assignments too, base on their lecturer needs.

Machine Learning Lecturer Assistant

Give score to machine learning task. The task will be a clustering or classification to a set of data. Conditionally i'll teach them is the class to base on their lecturer needs.

Web Development Study Group

This activity held by Basisdata Lab. In this activity i learng how to develop a website. Here I learn how to make website from zero. At the front-end i learn how to use html, css, javascript and bootstrap. At the back-end i learn how to use express js and MongoDB.

Big Data (Data Engineer) Study Group

This activity held by Basisdata Lab. In this activity i learn Big Data from Data Engineer's side. I learned how to make data fast to process. Also I learned how to use virtual machine, hadoop and other Data Engineer things.
